about_the_game:
Dear Commander

Welcome to "Miya," a brand new action game filled with futuristic technology and dazzling combat! In this game world full of surprises and challenges, you will play the role of the beautiful warrior Miya, embarking on an exciting adventure and engaging in thrilling battles against various enemies. You will experience the exhilarating action design, excellent sense of impact, and block counter system. At the same time, you can also collect fashion items to give Miya a unique look and make her the focus of the future battlefield.

Action Design and Sense of Impact
The action design of "Miya" is rich and diverse, featuring not only gorgeous melee attacks but also powerful ranged weapons and cool skills. The sense of impact in the game has also been carefully polished, making every attack exhilarating. Meanwhile, the game also introduces a block counter system, adding more strategy and challenge to the combat. In the fast-paced battles, you need to observe the enemy's movements, accurately block and counterattack to achieve victory.

Fashion Collection
In the game world of "Miya," the fashion designs are unique, featuring a futuristic technology feel and anime-style beauty. By collecting different fashion items, you can create a unique look for Miya, allowing her to shine with stunning brilliance in battle.
